outputs.output_descr: This project provides emergency support to Tokwe  Mukorsi flooding disaster in three areas (i) livelihoods needs assessment of  the affected population (ii) conflict-sensitive recovery planning  and (iii) effective coordination of livelihoods recovery  interventions for the flood affected population.

project_descr: Emergency Support to Tokwe Mukorsi Floods Livelihoods Assessment and Recovery Planning under TRAC 3 Category II funding
project_title: Emergency Livelihoods Support to Tokwe Mukorsi
